item.title: Oppo is about to launch the world's thinnest foldable phone - Mashable
item.description:
Oppo is about to launch the world's thinnest foldable phone

Publication Date: February 2023 Source: Mashable

Oppo is poised to take the spotlight with its upcoming Oppo Find N5, claiming it will be the thinnest foldable phone in the world, significantly thinner than current models.

  • Oppo teases a foldable phone that is thinner than a common pencil.
  • The phone is expected to feature a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and a triple 50-megapixel rear camera.
  • The launch is anticipated in February, with limited availability primarily in China.
“A foldable phone this thin feels like having your cake and eating it too — you get that extra screen real estate without sacrificing pocketability.”

The Oppo Find N5 marks a significant advancement in smartphone design, catering to users seeking both portability and functionality in foldable devices.

item.title: Great Indian Republic Day Sale 2025: Top smartphone deals on Amazon - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Great Indian Republic Day Sale 2025: Top Smartphone Deals on Amazon

Published: 13 January 2025, 12:35 IST

The annual Great Indian Republic Day sale has begun on Amazon, featuring attractive discounts on a wide array of smartphones from renowned brands.

  • Apple iPhone 15 series is available starting at Rs 56,999 (base model 128GB).
  • Vivo X200 5G priced at Rs 65,900 (12GB RAM + 256GB storage).
  • Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra starting at Rs 71,990 (12GB RAM + 256GB storage).
  • OnePlus 13R available for as low as Rs 42,998 (12GB RAM + 256GB storage).
  • Samsung Galaxy A35 5G offered at Rs 22,999 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Honor 200 5G priced at Rs 21,998 (8GB RAM + 256GB storage).
  • Nothing Phone (2a) starting at Rs 21,270 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Oppo A74 5G being sold at Rs 15,489 (6GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • iQOO Z9s 5G offered for Rs 19,498 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • OnePlus Nord CE 4 starting at Rs 21,599 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Poco M6 Plus available at Rs 10,499 (6GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Motorola Moto G35 5G for as low as Rs 10,599 (4GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Redmi 13 5G priced at Rs 12,280 (6GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Tecno Pop 9 offered at Rs 6,299 (3GB RAM + 64GB storage).
  • Xiaomi Redmi A4 5G priced at Rs 8,999 (4GB RAM + 128GB storage).

With significant discounts and exchange offers available, the sale is expected to attract numerous buyers looking for premium smartphones at reduced prices.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Price Leaked Ahead of Launch; Tipped to Cost More Than Galaxy S24 Models - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Leak Suggest Hiked Prices Over Preceding S24 Lineup

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: Gadgets 360

The Samsung Galaxy S25 series is set to debut at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22 in San Jose, California, with leaked pricing suggesting higher costs compared to the Galaxy S24 lineup.

  • The standard Galaxy S25 is expected to start at VND 23,990,000 (approx. Rs. 81,800).
  • The Galaxy S25+ will be priced at VND 27,990,000 (approx. Rs. 95,400).
  • The S25 Ultra could begin at VND 34,990,000 (approx. Rs. 1,19,300).
  • Previous Galaxy S24 prices indicate a notable increase for the new models.
"These leaked prices suggest that the upcoming Galaxy S-series handsets from Samsung will launch at higher prices than the preceding Galaxy S24 lineup."

Overall, the Samsung Galaxy S25 series is gearing up for a potential pricing overhaul as it prepares for its official launch.

item.title: Oppo Find N5 Confirmed to Launch in China Next Month; May Debut Globally as OnePlus Open 2 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo Confirms It Will Launch Find N5 in China Next Month

Publication Date: February 2024

Source: Gadgets 360

Oppo has officially announced that it will launch its new foldable smartphone, the Find N5, in China next month. This device is anticipated to be the successor to the Find N3 and is teased to be the world's slimmest foldable phone.

  • The Oppo Find N5 is set to launch in February 2024.
  • It is being marketed as the “world's slimmest foldable” phone.
  • Oppo Chief Product Officer Pete Lau confirmed the launch on Weibo.
  • The device may sport a triple rear camera setup from Hasselblad and support satellite communication.
  • Expected features include a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a large battery with wireless charging.
“The thinnest foldable phone in the world.” - Pete Lau, Oppo Chief Product Officer

Overall, the Oppo Find N5 launch aims to push boundaries in the foldable smartphone market, showcasing innovations in design and technology.

item.title: AI has venture investors excited about (yes) accounting firms | Mint - Mint
item.description:
AI Drives Venture Capital Interest in Accounting Firms

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mint

Venture capitalists are increasingly investing in accounting firms as the industry embraces AI technology, moving beyond traditional tech startups.

  • Venture firms like Bessemer Venture Partners, General Catalyst, and Thrive Capital are acquiring stakes in accounting firms.
  • The trend is emerging alongside recent private equity deals, signaling a transformation in the accounting sector.
  • The shift highlights the growing importance of AI and technology in traditional business operations.
“Venture capitalists are known for betting on risky, moonshot technology. But recently, some of them are heading to a quiet hamlet of the business world: accounting firms.”

This trend indicates a significant change in how venture capitalists perceive the potential of accounting, opening doors for innovation in the sector.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale Brings Up to 65 Percent Discount on Large Home Appliances - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Get Up to 65 Percent Discount on Large Home Appliances During Amazon Sale

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Gadgets 360

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 offers significant discounts on a variety of large home appliances, with reductions up to 65 percent.

  • Direct discounts, exchange deals, and bank benefits available.
  • Prominent brands include Samsung, LG, Daikin, and more.
  • Notable deal: Samsung refrigerator reduced from Rs. 71,990 to Rs. 51,990.
  • Additional coupon discounts and a 10 percent instant discount on SBI transactions.
“Customers can avail of a 10 percent instant discount up to Rs. 14,000 on SBI card transactions.”

The sale provides opportunities for significant savings and encourages shoppers to take advantage of bargains on essential home appliances.

item.title: Apple's Next Watch SE Model to Arrive Later This Year With New Look: Mark Gurman - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Apple Watch SE 3 Could Arrive With a Redesigned Look

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Gadgets 360

Apple's affordable Watch SE has not seen a yearly upgrade since its inception in 2020. A third-generation model is expected to be launched with a redesigned look.

  • The new Apple Watch SE is reported to have a design makeover, possibly swapping out the aluminum shell for plastic.
  • Expected launch alongside the iPhone 17 series in September.
  • Apple Watch Series 11 and Watch Ultra 3 models will likely be introduced, retaining a similar design to their predecessors.
  • New features for Apple Watch Ultra may include satellite connectivity and 5G RedCap network access.
  • A revamped health app and AI coaching service are also in development.
“A fresh version of the lower-end SE model will sport a new look,” said Mark Gurman.

The introduction of the Apple Watch SE 3 seems to mark a significant update to the series, aligning with advancements and expectations set by its predecessors.

item.description:
These four Apple devices may get upgraded in 2025

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Tech News

Apple is rumored to upgrade four major devices in 2025, focusing on innovation and improvements across its product range.

  • The potential upgrades include key enhancements in performance and features.
  • Industry experts speculate on the impacts these upgrades may have on competition.
  • Apple's focus is reportedly on introducing new technologies while maintaining user satisfaction.
  • These upgrades could align with Apple's strategy to enhance its ecosystem.
“Apple is always pushing the boundaries of technology; the 2025 lineup is expected to reflect their latest vision.”

In conclusion, the impending upgrades highlight Apple's commitment to innovation and its competitive strategy in the tech industry.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim: What to expect from the rumoured upcoming device - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim: What to expect from the rumoured upcoming device

Publication Date: January 2024, Source: CNBC TV18

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim is anticipated to be unveiled during the first Unpacked event of the year on January 22. Set between the Galaxy S25+ and S25 Ultra, this model promises high-end performance with a sleek design.

  • Expected thickness of just 6.5mm, making it quite slim compared to most smartphones.
  • Features a 6.66-inch display and powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Battery capacity estimated between 4,700mAh and 5,000mAh.
  • Camera system includes a 200MP main camera, a 50MP ultrawide camera, and a telephoto lens with 3.5x optical zoom, borrowing features from the S25 Ultra.
  • Pricing details are unclear, but expected to be positioned between the S25+ and S25 Ultra.
  • Availability likely in the second quarter of the year.
"The main camera will feature a 200MP ISOCELL HP5 sensor—likely an upgrade from the S25+ and a closer match to the Ultra model."

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim is generating buzz among fans, especially with its innovative camera features and slim profile, setting the stage for future designs in the Galaxy lineup.

item.title: iPhone 15 available under ₹55,000 during Republic Day Sale. Should you buy? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
iPhone 15 Available Under ₹55,000 During Republic Day Sale: Is It Worth Buying?

Publication Date: January 2024 Source: Tech News

The iPhone 15, which launched at ₹79,900, is currently available for under ₹55,000 during the Amazon Republic Day Sale, making it a more accessible option for consumers looking for an Apple smartphone.

Key Points:

  • Current price of iPhone 15 during the sale is ₹57,499 for the 128GB variant.
  • With an additional ₹2,900 cashback using Amazon Pay ICICI Bank credit card, the effective price drops to ₹54,599.
  • The iPhone 15 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display and the new Dynamic Island technology.
  • It includes a 48MP enhanced camera system with various zoom options and advanced HDR capabilities.
  • The device is powered by the A16 Bionic chipset and includes 6GB of RAM.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“The iPhone 15 boasts enhanced performance and camera features, and is now available at a significantly reduced price.”

Conclusion:

With its price drop, the iPhone 15 presents an attractive option for buyers seeking a high-quality smartphone with advanced features.

item.title: Apple's iPhone lineup could get a major refresh this year: Thinnest iPhone ever, revamp SE model, and mor - The Times of India
item.description:
Apple's iPhone lineup could get a major refresh this year: Thinnest iPhone ever, revamp SE model, and more expected

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Times of India

This year's iPhone release is expected to introduce several significant updates, including the thinnest iPhone ever and a revamped SE model, among other enhancements.

  • Introduction of the thinnest iPhone model to date.
  • Major redesign of the iPhone SE model is anticipated.
  • Additional refinements in hardware and software functionalities are expected.
  • Focus on improving user experience and performance enhancements.
“Apple is known for its innovative design, and this year is no exception with exciting updates on the horizon.”

The anticipated changes not only aim to excite existing customers but also attract new users to the iPhone ecosystem.

item.title: JVC re-enters Indian TV market through licence pact with Super Plastronics - The Week
item.description:
JVC Re-enters Indian TV Market through Licence Pact with Super Plastronics

Date: January 13, 2025 Source: PTI

Japanese electronics brand JVC is re-entering the Indian television market through a licensing agreement with Noida-based Super Plastronics Pvt Ltd. The brand aims to cater to the growing demand for premium smart televisions in India.

  • JVC previously entered the Indian market in 2019 with Veira Group.
  • The new smart QLED televisions will be available exclusively on Amazon.
  • SPPL will manufacture JVC TVs, expanding its portfolio alongside brands like Thomson and Kodak.
  • The brand’s TVs will start at a price of Rs 11,999 and will be available from January 14, 2025.
“India is one of the fastest-growing markets in the world, and we believe our innovative, high-quality products will resonate with local consumers,” said Pallavi Singh, JVC TV India Country Representative.

JVC's return highlights its strategy to tap into the rapidly growing Indian market despite challenges in growth due to reduced demand for smaller screens.

item.title: Gurman: iPhone 17 Air, new baseline iPad and iPad Air coming this year - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Gurman: iPhone 17 Air, new baseline iPad and iPad Air coming this year

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Bloomberg

Apple is preparing for several key product launches in 2025, including the new iPhone 17 series and updated iPads.

  • New 13” and 15” MacBook Air models featuring the Apple M4 chip are set to launch.
  • The iPhone SE is expected to arrive in Spring 2025 starting at $429.
  • Apple will introduce two entry-level iPads powered by the Apple A17 Pro chip.
  • New iPad Air models with the latest Apple M4 chip are also on the horizon.
  • A smart home hub device with a 7-inch touchscreen is expected in March.
  • The iPhone 17 series, including iPhone 17 Air, will be launched in the fall of 2025.
“The Air was most recently rumored to measure 5.5mm at its thinnest point – over 2mm thinner than the current iPhone 16.”

This upcoming product lineup promises to enhance Apple’s offerings and improve user experience across its devices.

item.title: ASUS Zenfone 12 Ultra to be announced on February 6 - FoneArena
item.description:
ASUS Zenfone 12 Ultra to be Announced on February 6

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: FoneArena

ASUS has confirmed that it will announce the Zenfone 12 Ultra on February 6th, succeeding the Zenfone 11 Ultra. The company emphasizes a focus on AI-enhanced mobile photography.

  • The Zenfone 12 Ultra is expected to feature 4K video recording.
  • Similar specifications to the rebranded ROG Phone 9 are anticipated.
  • Specifications may include a 6.78-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, and a 50MP main camera.
  • The launch event will start at 2:30 PM Taiwan Time (12:00 PM IST) and will be live-streamed.
The Zenfone 12 Ultra unlocks the power of AI, so get ready to step into a new era of mobile photography excellence!

The ASUS Zenfone 12 Ultra launch promises innovative features, highlighting mobile photography advancements with AI technology.

item.title: Top Tech News: Apple Unveils 2025 Lineup: New iPhone, MacBook, iPad, and More; AIFs Target Govt Funds to Boost Sunrise and Deep-Tech Startups - Analytics Insight
item.description:
Top Tech News: Apple Unveils 2025 Lineup: New iPhone, MacBook, iPad, and More

Published on: 13 Jan 2025, 7:40 am

Good morning, tech fam; here are some quick tech updates for you to catch on to!

This article provides an overview of the latest tech news, highlighting Apple's upcoming product releases and initiatives aimed at boosting innovation in startups.

  • Apple plans to launch the iPhone SE 4 and MacBook Air in early 2025.
  • The iPhone 17 series and Apple Watch Series 11 are expected in mid to late 2025.
  • Alternate Investment Funds (AIFs) are seeking government funds to support sunrise and deep-tech startups.
  • ONGC is looking to fill 108 vacancies for various engineering and geoscience roles.
  • The crypto sector sees developments with Ripple’s RLUSD stablecoin gaining prominence.
“Established in 2016, the Fund of Funds for Startups has supported Rs 20,572.14 crore in startup investments.”

The tech industry is set for significant advancements in 2025 with Apple leading the charge in innovation and government efforts aimed at fostering new startups.

item.title: Apple Planning To Include iPhone 17 Air In 2025 Lineup, May Be Thinnest iPhone Ever - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Apple Planning To Include iPhone 17 Air In 2025 Lineup, May Be Thinnest iPhone Ever

Date: 13 Jan 2025, Source: NDTV Profit Tech

The Apple iPhone 17 Air is set to be unveiled in 2025 and is expected to be the company’s thinnest iPhone to date, potentially including Apple's first in-house modem.

  • The iPhone 17 Air may be approximately 6.25 mm thick, making it thinner than both the iPhone 16 Pro and the iPhone 6.
  • It is anticipated to feature Apple's first in-house 5G modem to enhance performance without compromising device features.
  • The device may include a 6.6-inch ProMotion OLED display with a 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Speculated camera features include a 48-megapixel rear camera and a 24-megapixel front camera.
  • It may be powered by the A19 chip and come with 8GB of RAM.
Mark Gurman states that reaching this level of thinness will pave the way for Apple’s upcoming foldable gadgets.

In conclusion, the iPhone 17 Air represents Apple's commitment to innovation in their device lineup, focusing on design and technology integration.

item.title: Flipkart Monumental Sale is live these users: Get up to 50% off on iPhone, Galaxy devices and more - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Flipkart Monumental Sale is live these users: Get up to 50% off on iPhone, Galaxy devices and more

Date: January 13, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The Flipkart Monumental Sale is now live for Plus members, offering early access to various discounts. This sale features significant price drops on popular devices, especially iPhones and Samsung Galaxy smartphones.

  • Discounts on iPhones, including the iPhone 16 128GB at Rs 63,999 and iPhone 16 Pro at Rs 1,02,999.
  • Older models like iPhone 15, iPhone 14, and iPhone 13 will also see considerable price reductions.
  • The sale opens to all users at midnight on January 13.
“Flipkart always offers some interesting deals and discounts on Apple devices, especially iPhones.”

This sale is a great opportunity for consumers looking to purchase Apple or Galaxy devices at lowered prices.

item.title: 5 Best Phones Under Rs 35000 To Buy In 2025 - Times Now
item.description:
5 Best Phones Under Rs 35000 To Buy In 2025

Publication Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Times Now Digital

This article presents a selection of the top five smartphones that can be purchased for under Rs 35000 in 2025, detailing their features and pricing.

  • Realme GT 6T: 6.78-inch display, Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3, 50MP main camera, 120W charging, priced at Rs 30,999.
  • Nothing Phone 2: 6.7-inch display, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, 50MP dual camera, priced at Rs 34,749.
  • Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus: 6.67-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 7s Gen 3, 6200mAh battery, priced at Rs 32,999.
  • Samsung Galaxy S23 FE: 6.4-inch AMOLED display, 50MP camera setup, priced at Rs 34,149.
  • Poco X7 Pro: 6.67-inch AMOLED, MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra, 6000mAh battery, priced at Rs 27,999.
“Here are the 5 Best Phones Under Rs 35000 To Buy In 2025.”

The selection reflects the best budget-friendly options available, catering to various user needs and preferences.

item.title: JVC marks India comeback with Google TV-based QLED TV range: Details here - Business Standard
item.description:
JVC marks India comeback with Google TV-based QLED TV range: Details here

Publication Date: January 2023
Source: [Source Name]

JVC (Japan Victor Company) has made its return to the Indian market with a new range of Made in India smart QLED televisions, set to launch on Amazon India during the Republic Day Sale from January 14. The TVs are available in seven different sizes, starting at Rs 11,999.

Key features include:

  • Seven display sizes ranging from 32-inch to 75-inch.
  • Up to 4K UHD resolution with HDR10 support.
  • Audio with Dolby Atmos and up to 80W output.
  • Built-in Google TV platform with popular streaming app access.
  • Connectivity options including HDMI, USB, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth.
“India is one of the fastest-growing markets in the world, and we believe our innovative, high-quality products will resonate with local consumers,” said Pallavi Singh, country representative, JVC TV India.

JVC aims to achieve ₹500 crores in revenue over the next three years, emphasizing innovation and consumer engagement.
